item.title: Use IFTTT to send currency exchange rate mail daily
item.description: Requirement I want to have a daily mail including currency exchange rate information. Mail subject: include the exchange rate in the mail subject. Mail content: Has some links to banks' exchange rate page. Include some exchange rate history chart. Solution Use ifttt.com Create a new Applet on IFTTT Add a new "If This" Choose "finance" service Choose "Today's exchange rate report" Choose the input/output currency and trigger time. Add a new "Then That" Choose a "gmail" service If you just want to send yourself an email, you can click the right button.
